55|76|(avarkalin kanavarkal) ciranta pacumaiyana, irattinak kampalankalil tintu talaiyanaikalin mitu cayntavarkalaka irupparkal

55|78|(napiye!) Mikka cirappum, kanniyamum ulla umatu iraivanin tiruppeyar mika pakkiyamutaiyatu
56|5|malaikal (peyarntu onrotonru moti) tul tulakap parantu vitum
56|8|(mutalavatu:) Valappakkattilullavarkal. Valappakkattilulla (i)varkal yar? (Enpatai arivirkala? Avarkal mika pakkiyavankal)
56|9|(irantavatu:) Itappakkattilullavarkal. Itappakkattilulla (i)varkal yar? (Enpatai arivirkala? Ivarkal mikka turatirstacalikal)
56|10|(munravatu:) Muncenru vittavarkal. (Ivarkal nanmaiyana kariyankalil marra anaivaraiyumvita) muncenru vittavarkal
56|16|oruvarai oruvar mukam nokki(p pancanaiyin mitu) cayntavarkalaka irupparkal
